mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reference to the Presidential election of 2000 and opinion about studying [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
BUSH WINS! 12-12-2000 | TIME TO GO BACK HOME, AL GORE | A~X | Studying Sucks Drinking is better | 12/13/15
